summary.content: Here are a few interesting reads from around the world wide web this evening. Microsoft trying to control blogging. Gator tries to shed it’s self-inflicted unpopularity by changing it’s name to Claria. Napster’s back (well, it’s pretending to be…). MSN splits in two. Mozilla Firebird is a viable (and better) alternative to Microsoft Internet Explorer. Well, duh! Eolas, don’t make the W3C smack you down…

content.html:
Here are a few interesting reads from around the world wide web this evening.

  • Microsoft trying to control blogging.
  • Gator tries to shed it’s self-inflicted unpopularity by changing it’s name to Claria.
  • Napster’s back (well, it’s pretending to be…).
  • MSN splits in two.
  • Mozilla Firebird is a viable (and better) alternative to Microsoft Internet Explorer. Well, duh!
  • Eolas, don’t make the W3C smack you down…
content.plain:
Here are a few interesting reads from around the world wide web this evening.
 Microsoft trying to control blogging. Gator tries to shed it’s self-inflicted unpopularity by changing it’s name to Claria. Napster’s back (well, it’s pretending to be…). MSN splits in two. Mozilla Firebird is a viable (and better) alternative to Microsoft Internet Explorer. Well, duh! Eolas, don’t make the W3C smack you down…
content.source:
Here are a few interesting reads from around the world wide web this evening.

* [Microsoft trying to control blogging.]({{% wayback "http://www.michaelhanscom.com/eclecticism/2003/10/even_microsoft_.html" %}})
* [Gator tries to shed it’s self-inflicted unpopularity by changing it’s name to Claria.]({{% wayback "http://news.com.com/2100-1024_3-5099212.html?tag=nefd_top" %}})
* [Napster’s back (well, it’s pretending to be…).]({{% wayback "http://www.napster.com" %}})
* [MSN splits in two.]({{% wayback "http://news.com.com/2100-1038_3-5098985.html?tag=nefd_top" %}})
* [Mozilla Firebird is a viable (and better) alternative to Microsoft Internet Explorer. Well, duh!]({{% wayback "http://www.smartcomputing.com/editorial/article.asp?article=articles/2003/s1411/31s11/31s11.asp" %}})
* [Eolas, don’t make the W3C smack you down…]({{% wayback "http://www.webstandards.org/buzz/archive/2003_10.html#a000237" %}})
